channel.title: Design so far... [Updated with live preview]
channel.description:
Yeah, I got bored and went into mad focus were I was really pissed at gimp for crashing on me in the middle of a great design. But its OK, I definitely seen why it shut down. Gimp told me the truth about it straight up forward and said... "This damn design suck so I'll make you start all over for a BETTER one and if you do the same I will do it AGAIN! AND AGAIN! AND AGAIN [...]" and I come back pissed at it and somehow get this design :o... LOL unexpected design too, I just literally put matching colors together and 'walla-wonka-BOOM-BOOM!' like OMG this design has to be good ffs its like killer crystal design!
And umm...yeh...check this out though eheh :D :D :D :D: [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii3/Ixl_photos/Design-1.png[/img]
by the way that second box is the statistics to see if anyone is on my page (hehe, better to know then not to know lol).
Here is current live preview: http://www.sayyox.byethost13.com/
